description:
L'application OMNIDOC Santé révolutionne l'accès aux soins médicaux en offrant une plateforme complète et intuitive pour la gestion des services de santé à domicile. Conçue pour simplifier la vie des patients et des professionnels de santé, OMNIDOC Santé est l'outil indispensable pour toute demande de soins médicaux urgents ou planifiés, directement à votre porte.

Pour les Patients:

Demande de Médecin à Domicile: Accédez instantanément à un réseau de médecins qualifiés pour des consultations à domicile, en urgence ou sur rendez-vous, selon votre convenance.
Service d'Ambulance: En quelques clics, demandez une ambulance équipée pour une intervention rapide en cas d'urgence, garantissant une prise en charge immédiate et efficace.
Planification Facile: Organisez vos rendez-vous médicaux à l'avance, avec une interface simple d'utilisation qui vous permet de choisir le jour et l'heure qui vous conviennent le mieux.
Pour les Professionnels de Santé:

Missions Flexibles: Offrez vos services en tant que médecin ou ambulancier et bénéficiez d'une flexibilité totale pour accepter les missions qui correspondent à votre emploi du temps et à vos spécialités.
Gestion des Déplacements: Utilisez notre système de géolocalisation pour optimiser vos itinéraires et réduire le temps de déplacement entre deux interventions.
Rémunération et Suivi: Profitez d'un système de facturation intégré et transparent pour toutes vos missions, avec un suivi détaillé de vos revenus et des opportunités de missions supplémentaires.
Avantages Clés:

Accès Facilité aux Soins: OMNIDOC Santé élimine les barrières géographiques et temporelles, offrant un accès rapide et facile aux soins médicaux.
Sécurité et Confidentialité: Nous garantissons la sécurité de vos données personnelles et médicales, avec un engagement fort envers la confidentialité et le respect de la vie privée.
Qualité et Fiabilité: Chaque professionnel de santé est rigoureusement sélectionné pour garantir des soins de la plus haute qualité à nos utilisateurs.
OMNIDOC Santé est plus qu'une application; c'est votre partenaire de santé à domicile, alliant technologie et soins médicaux pour offrir une expérience utilisateur exceptionnelle. Que vous ayez besoin d'une consultation médicale urgente ou que vous souhaitiez planifier des soins à domicile, OMNIDOC Santé est là pour vous accompagner à chaque étape.

This app is freely downloadable, however in-app purchase is required to unlock the contents. 
The complete Skeletal System and a few other contents are always freely accessible enabling you to try the app properly.

"Anatomy 3D Atlas" allows you to study human anatomy in an easy and interactive way. 
Through a simple and intuitive interface it is possible to observe every anatomical structure from any angle.
The anatomical 3D models are particularly detailed and with textures up to 4k resolution.

The subdivision by regions and the predefined views facilitate the observation and the study of single parts or groups of systems and the relationships between different organs.

"Anatomy - 3D Atlas" is an application aimed at medical students, doctors, physiotherapists, paramedics, nurses, athletic trainers and in anyone interested in deepening their knowledge of human anatomy.
This app is a fantastic tool to complement classic human anatomy books.

ANATOMICAL 3D MODELS
• Musculoskeletal system
• Cardiovascular system
• Nervous system
• Respiratory System
• Digestive System
• Urogenital system (male and female)
• Endocrine system
• Lymphatic system
• Eye and ear system

FEATURES
• Simple and intuitive interface
• Rotate and zoom each model in 3D space
• Option to hide or isolate single or multiple selected models
• Filter to hide or display each system
• Search function to easily find every anatomical part
• Bookmark function to save custom views
• Smart rotation which moves the center of rotation automatically
• Transparency function
• Visualization of muscles through levels of layers from the superficial ones down to the deepest ones
• By selecting a model or a pin, the related anatomical term shows up
• Description of the muscles: origin, insertion, innervation and action
• Show/Hide UI interface (very useful with small screens)

MULTILINGUAL
• The anatomical terms and the user interface are available in 12 languages: Latin, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean and Turkish
• The anatomical terms can be displayed in two languages simultaneously

A true and totally 3D app for studying human anatomy, built on an advanced interactive 3D touch interface.

Features:
- You can rotate models to any angles and zoom in and out.
- Remove estructures to reveal the anatomical structures below them.
- 3D location quizzes to test your knowledge
- Switch on/off different anatomy systems
- Both male and female reproductive systems are available

Contents:
- Bones
- Ligaments
- Joints
- Muscles
- Circulation (arteries, vein and heart)
- Central nervous system
- Peripheral nervous system
- Sense organs
- Respiratory
- Digestive
- Urinary
- Reproductive ( both male and female)

Easily keep track of your health with the Doctolib app:
• Access the availabilities of thousands of healthcare professionals from all specialities
• Find and book medical appointments 24/7 online for in-person or video consultations
• Send messages to doctors and therapists for follow up prescriptions, test results and more
• Add relatives to your account to easily manage their appointments
• Look after your child's appointments and documents together with another parent
• Get automatic reminders for appointments in the app so you never miss one
• Share prescriptions and other medical documents securely with your practitioner and pharmacy for seamless care
• Store your appointment history and medical documents

Doctolib - one of Europe's leading e-health companies:
• 80 million patients
• 900,000 healthcare professionals in France, Germany, and Italy

Your health. Your data.
Protecting your personal data is our absolute priority and influences everything we do at Doctolib.

The Doctolib app is available in English, French, German, and Italian.

Saydalia est la première plateforme numérique permettant de géolocaliser les pharmacies et les parapharmacies partout sur le territoire marocain. Et ce, 24h/24, week-ends et jours fériés inclus.

Cette solution digitale vous facilite l’accès à l’ensemble des pharmacies et des parapharmacies ouvertes à proximité de chez vous, du lundi au samedi et même le dimanche, en vous informant sur leurs localisations, leurs adresses, leurs numéros de téléphone, etc.

360 medics becomes PulseLife to answer all your medical questions! 

Medical search engine, clinical app ecosystem and scientific intelligence: get instant access to the information you need to make informed clinical decisions.    

More than 600,000 caregivers including 300,000 physicians users worldwide.
____________

- Your new way to search for medical information 
Thanks to our medical search engine, finding the answer to your medical questions has never been so fast, simple and reliable! 
-> Do you have questions about a pathology and its associated therapeutic strategy? Access the latest recommendations and decision trees that will help you manage your patients. You can also access the list of all drugs for this disease.  
-> Do you want to know the dosage of a drug? Its contra-indications? Its side effects? Find the answers to these questions in a few clicks (sources MHRA)
-> Do you want to know about the latest scientific advances? Type in the topic you are looking for and access the latest scientific news from millions of sources (The Lancet, Sciencedirect...Etc.).  
-> Do you want to calculate a score (creatinine clearance, well score...) ? Type the name of the score in the PulseLife search bar and access a simple and interactive calculation tool for a quick result.  
 
- All your essential clinical tools in PulseLife  
A unique ecosystem of clinical apps to support you in your consultations: calculators, scores, decision aids, clinical cases. These tools are developed by the most expert scientific partners in each specialty (learned societies, colleges, etc.). 
 
- All the medical watch, updated in real time, accessible on PulseLife 
To keep up with the constant evolution of knowledge, access a personalized scientific watch according to your profile. More than 3000 recognized scientific journals are referenced. 
 

PulseLife (ex 360 medics) has also thought about your organization with :

A secure drive to add your medical documents and take your medical knowledge library with you everywhere (20GB offered).
A To do list to manage your daily medical tasks so you don't forget anything!
____________

All services are free and optimized for different media (mobile, tablet, PC).


Do you like our application? Don't hesitate to share your opinion on the app store!
To learn more, visit our website at: www.pulselife.com and for any question, contact us at contact.uk@pulselife.com

____________


TRANSPARENCY: the source of each content or article published on the service is clearly mentioned. The drug files are reproduced as published on the public database by the ANSM. This information must not be used in any way to replace the medical opinion of a health professional.
DATA PROTECTION: no personal information is disclosed to a third party, whether it is about your identity, your behavior or any other nominative information. 360 medics is committed to protecting your anonymity on 360 medics.

This app helps you monitor your baby's development. It can help you follow the baby's sleep patterns: how long they sleep and whether they are keeping to schedule. Breast feeding: how much and how often your baby eats. Pumping schedule. Diaper changes. Also, you can keep a record of your baby's health: temperature, illnesses, vaccinations and doctor's visits. Add notes on your baby's mood and important events, such as: first words, first laugh, etc. Record changes in weight, length and head size.

Main Tracking Features: 
* Feeding (by breast, bottle or baby food) 
* Diaper changes 
* Sleep, activity and mood changes 
* Breast pump scheduling 
* Extra notes for doctor's visits and vaccinations 
* Add changes to size and weight 
* Add photographs and comment on events 
* Convenient layout and organization for journal and notes

If you have any questions or requests, please write to neumandev@gmail.com. We are eager to hear your comments on how to improve the app.

***THE WORLD’S LEADING 3D ANATOMY PLATFORM! TRY IT FOR FREE TODAY***

COMPLETE ANATOMY: A 3D ANATOMY JOURNEY POWERFULLY TAILORED TO YOU

A flexible, inclusive and personalized learning platform that uses the visual power of incredibly detailed 3D models to make anatomy easier to understand.

FREE DOWNLOAD: Create an account for a FREE 3-day trial of premium features and content.
Access Complete Anatomy from ALL your compatible devices with a single annual subscription.

Experience the BEST anatomy platform available today:

THE MOST DETAILED AND COMPLETE human anatomy models, with thousands of individual interactive structures, including a living, beating, dissectible human heart in full 3D

UNIQUE MODEL CUSTOMISATION allowing you to personalise your anatomy model based on your preferences

Atlas of over 700 Screens, based on illustrations from Elsevier's foremost anatomy textbooks

Complete courses, including Female Anatomy presented by Alice Roberts, Dissection courses, Human Anatomy, Point of Care Ultrasound, Clinical Correlates & many more

Dynamic Cross-sections, real-time Muscle Motion, Insertion & Origin mapping, Bone Surface & Landmark mapping, 12 layered systems, Nerve Tracer, Blood Supply Tracer

39 stunning Microscopic anatomy models

AR mode including multiuser AR on compatible devices

Over 1,500 clinical videos on Cardiology, Orthopedics, Ophthalmology, Dentistry & Fitness

English, French, German, Spanish and Chinese language support.

TO BE THE BEST, USE THE BEST: Complete Anatomy is recognised as the best by the world's leading colleges & anatomists.

“Complete Anatomy has a wider depth and breadth of offerings than other anatomy platforms currently available (e.g. Primal Pictures, Visible Body) as well as more detail in its models. Other anatomy apps do not offer the ability to share content and have fewer tools with which to dissect and label models”.

- The Journal of the Medical Library Association

“Complete Anatomy is a lifesaver for me. It's helped me pass all my exams, I have it on all my devices and the accuracy is amazing. I love it!”

- Amy Morgan, Medical Student, Trinity College Dublin

“I would definitely recommend this platform for any institution teaching anatomy”

 - Jorgen Olsen, Educator, University of Copenhagen

“I wouldn't be able to deliver my teaching without Complete Anatomy, especially now that most of the teaching is expected to be online”

 - Munesh Khamuani, Educator, University of Birmingham

STUDENT LICENSE includes:
• Access to 3D models across all available platforms
• Access to all Courses
• Access to over 1,500 videos
• Access to the vast library of curated learning material

PRO LICENSE: all the benefits of the Student License PLUS:
• A license to use in clinical practice for patient education
• A license to present/teach in the classroom, lab or lecture theatre

The BioDigital Human is the most comprehensive 3D virtual model of the human body ever assembled, and the only application that includes interactive 3D anatomy, physiology, conditions, and treatments. 

The free version provides 10 model views / month and storage of up to 5 models in your personal library.
bug fixes and application updates
The Personal Plus Upgrade is available at $19.99/year and gives unrestricted access to our entire library of 700+ anatomy and health condition models, with unlimited storage of 3D models in your personal library. 

Our Human Library contains over 700 3D anatomy models, and is the most comprehensive, scientifically-accurate, and widely-used virtual model of the human body ever assembled. Perfect for learning anatomy and enhancing health literacy, people around the world are using the BioDigital Human to learn and educate on anatomy, physiology, treatments, and health conditions such as cancer, heart disease, injuries and more. The BioDigital Human online application, included in your registration and available at human.biodigital.com, empowers you to create your own custom 3D models to visualize anatomy and the inner workings of the human body.

Trusted by 3,000,000+ students from nearly 5,000 institutions, the BioDigital Human is used globally by leading medical schools, health systems, medical device, pharmaceutical and education companies including J&J, NYU Medical, Apple and Google.
 
Proven to increase learning retention by 43% as compared to students learning with traditional resources, and to improve assessment by 16% as compared to learning by cadaveric prosection.

PRESS:
“Think: Google Earth meets the human body” - ABC News
“The virtual body as the health education equivalent of Google Maps” - The New York Times
“xbox, Gray’s Anatomy combining to become a way to look inside the body” - MSNBC

APP FEATURES:
- Validated, professional-grade complete male and female 3D human anatomy models
- Over 20 Regional and System-based anatomy models
- Over 600 interactive 3D health condition models
- 8 different languages
- Personalized library for quick access to your content
- 3D interaction tools to rotate, zoom, draw on, dissect and share models
- Easy to use, intuitive interface that makes searching and saving simple
- Includes use of BioDigital Human online, accessible from any device at human.biodigital.com
- Unlike image based apps, true interactive 3D allowing you to see anatomical structures from any perspective

ANATOMY SYSTEMS:
- Cardiovascular system
- Connective tissue
- Muscular system
- Digestive system
- Lymphatic system
- Endocrine system
- Nervous system
- Skeletal system
- Respiratory system
- Reproductive system
- Urinary system
 
SPECIALITIES: 
- Allergy & Immunology
- Cardiology
- Dentistry
- Dermatology
- Endocrinology
- Gastroenterology
- Infectious Disease
- Nephrology
- Neurology & Psychiatry
- Obstetrics & Gynecology
- Hematology & Oncology
- Ophthalmology
- Orthopedics
- Otolaryngology
- Pediatrics
- Pulmonology
- Rheumatology
- Urology

Hirassa allows you to find the pharmacies that are on-duty nearby you. This is important because pharmacies in Morocco work regular hours, and only the on-duty ones work nights, weekends and holidays.
Our team collects and keeps up to date this data and provides it to you via Hirassa. 
This includes pharmacy name, its geolocation, its phone number and the time when its scheduled to be on-duty.
The on-duty schedule is rotation based. Depending on the city the rotation can be daily, weekly, twice a week, or a combination of those options.
We currently cover about 40 major city in Morocco and we continue to expand our coverage.
This includes Casablanca, Rabat, Fez, Marrakech, Tangiers, Agadir and others.

Huckleberry is your all-in-one parenting partner, proudly trusted by 5+ million families worldwide. 

From baby tracker to personalized guidance, our award-winning app helps you navigate sleep, feeding, milestones, and everything in between. Backed by a team of pediatric experts and powered by smart tools, Huckleberry supports each family’s unique journey. We turn restless nights into restful routines, making more space for everyday magic.

TRUSTED SLEEP GUIDANCE & TRACKING

Your baby's sleep and daily rhythms are unique. Our comprehensive baby tracker helps you understand their natural patterns while providing expert sleep guidance every step of the way. From breastfeeding to nappies, our newborn tracker gives you peace of mind in those early days and beyond.

SWEETSPOT®: YOUR SLEEP TIMING COMPANION

A most-loved feature that predicts your baby's ideal nap times with remarkable accuracy. No more guessing about sleep windows or watching for tired cues—SweetSpot® learns your child's unique rhythms to suggest optimal sleep times. Available with Plus and Premium memberships.

BERRY: 24/7 PARENTING GUIDANCE 

Instant parenting backup that adapts to what you need, when you need it. Using expert-vetted and AI-powered guidance, Berry can work through the messiness of parenting with you. You can solve challenges, get reassurance, and easily track multiple things at once—all in one AI chat. No matter the moment or mood, you always have backup.

FREE APP FEATURES

• Simple, one-touch baby tracker for sleep, nappy changes, feedings, pumping, growth, potty training, activities and medicine
• Complete breastfeeding timer with tracking for both sides
• Sleep summaries and history, plus average sleep totals
• Track multiple children with individual profiles
• Reminders when it’s time for medication, feedings, and more
• Sync with multiple caregivers across different devices

PLUS MEMBERSHIP

• All free features, and:
• SweetSpot®:  Predicts the ideal time for sleep (2+ months)
• Schedule Creator: Plan age-appropriate sleep schedules
• Insights: Data-driven tips and miniplans for sleep, feedings, and milestones (0-17 months)
• Enhanced Reports: Discover your child’s trends
• AI Logging: Track your child’s day through text, voice message, or photo

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP

• Everything in Plus, and:
• Berry: 24/7 guidance with our expert-vetted AI chat
• Custom Sleep Plans: expert-designed plans built for your child, with weekly progress check-ins and ongoing support as they grow 

GENTLE, EVIDENCE-BASED APPROACH

Our sleep guidance never requires "crying it out." Instead, we blend trusted sleep science with gentle, family-centered solutions that respect your parenting style. Every recommendation is made for your family's needs and comfort level.

PERSONALIZED PARENTING SUPPORT

• Expert newborn tracker tools and analytics
• Get custom sleep schedules based on your baby's age and patterns
• Science-backed guidance for common sleep challenges
• Navigate sleep regressions with confidence
• Receive timely recommendations as your baby grows
• Help your newborn develop healthy sleep habits from day one

AWARD-WINNING RESULTS

The Huckleberry baby tracker app ranked #1 in the iOS medical category globally. Today, we help families across 179 countries achieve better sleep. Up to 93% of families using our baby sleep tracking report improved sleep patterns.

Whether you're navigating newborn sleep, infant solids or toddler milestones, Huckleberry provides the tools and guidance your family needs to flourish.

Terms of Use: https://www.huckleberrycare.com/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://www.huckleberrycare.com/privacy-policy

Download the world's leading pregnancy tracker app today, for free week-by-week pregnancy information and articles!

The Pregnancy+ app features expert advice, daily articles, healthcare tips and interactive 3D models so you can track your baby's development. Our pregnancy app has been downloaded over 80 million times by expecting families. Join our worldwide community today! 

Baby Development
► Unique, interactive 3D models showing your baby's development 
► Baby Size Guide helps you visualise your baby's size in fruits, animals & sweets
► Pregnancy Week-by-Week Guides explain what to expect in each pregnancy week
► Simple & informative Pregnancy Timeline highlighting important milestones

Pregnancy Guides & Information
► In-depth Pregnancy Guides covering breastfeeding, exercise, food, twins & more 
► Daily Pregnancy Articles, tailored to your pregnancy stage
► 2D & 3D Scans by pregnancy week for you to browse
► Daily Blog Posts with tips, tricks & helpful advice
► Upload photos in My Bump to create a visual pregnancy diary

Pregnancy Tools
► Pregnancy Due Date Calculator helps you work out when your bundle will arrive
► Kick Counter tracks your baby's movements & activity
► Pregnancy Weight Log helps you keep an eye on changes in your weight
► Contraction Timer measures contractions throughout your labour

Organise & Plan
► Pregnancy Calendar enables you to plan & document your prenatal appointments
► Hospital Bag helps you prepare your hospital visit, for Mother, Birth Partner & Baby
► Birth Plan allows you to customise, organise & export your needs & wishes
► To-Do List & Baby Shopping List for ideas of what you need to do & buy
► Search thousands of Baby Names for inspiration & share your favourites

Our EXCLUSIVE 3D Models
Enjoy our unique 3D models showing your pregnancy's week-by-week development, from blastocyst to foetus to baby. Our 3D models truly help you to connect with the baby growing inside you. 
► Choose from multiple ethnicities
► Zoom in or out & rotate to see the baby's intricate detail
► Watch guided pregnancy week-by-week walk-throughs
► Tap to see baby movements

Pregnancy Articles & Guides
If you're feeling overwhelmed by all the advice out there, don't worry. Our Pregnancy + tracker app will guide you through your pregnancy, week-by-week, keeping you up to date with your baby's development and helping you stay healthy through pregnancy and beyond. The Pregnancy+ app content is written in-house, with the help of medical experts, lactation consultants, midwives and, of course, parents.

Share your journey with friends & family
Our pregnancy tracker app can be personalised so your partner, future grandparents or best friend can join in the fun and follow your baby's development in the womb, from bump to birth! Keep everyone up to date with your pregnancy by inviting them to download the app today.

Follow us on Social Media
Facebook: facebook.com/PregnancyPlusApp
Instagram: @pregnancyplus

The Pregnancy + tracker app wishes you a healthy, full-term pregnancy and a safe delivery.

Discover one of the top pregnancy tracker apps designed specifically for women and expecting parents. This application will keep you calm throughout your pregnancy, providing daily insights into your baby's development and your own health. It will let you know what’s happening with you and your unborn baby—week after week—and offer guidance on how to handle new situations. New, helpful articles are posted every day to support your pregnancy journey!




Keep track of your weight, blood pressure, tummy growth, baby's first movements, and contractions with our advanced tracking tools. Save all your important data in a single, easy-to-share report for your doctor, ensuring your pregnancy progress is well-documented.


May your pregnancy be pleasant and wonderful! Our app provides the tools and resources expecting parents need to feel confident and prepared.



The Most Interesting Features of the App:
- Convenient Calendar: Schedule tests and doctor visits effortlessly.  

- Pregnancy Diary: Use this tracker to log your weight, tummy size, blood pressure, mood, and sexual activity daily. Never miss appointments or key tests.  

- Weekly Baby Development Updates: Find out when your baby becomes the size of a grapefruit, grows eyelashes, or when you can discover their gender. Get nutritional and lifestyle advice tailored for women and their babies.  

- Daily Articles: Access a wealth of resources and tools with professional advice to help women navigate emotions, relationships, and health during pregnancy.  

- Doctor Report: Compile all your tracking data into a comprehensive report, available as a PDF or on your phone, to share with your doctor.  

- Checklists and To-Do Lists: Stay organized with trimester-specific checklists and to-do lists—perfect for expecting parents.  

- Smart Gestational Age Calculator: Trusted by top medical professionals, this tool calculates fetal and obstetric terms with pinpoint accuracy.  

- Kegel Exercises: Prepare for childbirth with guided exercises, an essential tool for women’s health during pregnancy.  

- Contraction Counter: This intelligent tracker distinguishes real contractions from practice ones, ensuring you and your baby are ready for delivery.  

- Health App Synchronization: Securely save your pregnancy tracking data with seamless integration.


We’ve worked hard to create one of the best apps for expectant mothers. Send your feedback to team@wachanga.com (mailto:team@wachanga.com)—we’re here to support women and parents every step of the way.

Vous êtes amené à rechercher de l’information sur le médicament, dans la pratique quotidienne ou lors de vos déplacements ? Bienvenue dans VIDAL Mobile, portail d’information sur le médicament pour le praticien nomade et l’étudiant. VIDAL Mobile est totalement gratuit et fonctionne sans connexion Internet.



*************************************


FONCTIONNALITÉS
- Monographies VIDAL
 • Une fiche d’information pour + de 11 000 médicaments et 4 000 produits de parapharmacie
 • Contenu conforme aux informations officielles et aux référentiels publics
 • Recherche par Nom commercial, Substance, VIDAL Recos, Indication, Laboratoire
- Fiches DCI VIDAL (dénomination communes internationales) disponible depuis la substance
 • Document décrivant les propriétés thérapeutiques d’une substance (DCI, dosage, voie, forme)
- VIDAL Recos
 • 185 stratégies thérapeutiques validées appuyées de grades de recommandation et 260 arbres décisionnels commentés
 • Rédigées par plus de 90 experts sous l'égide du comité scientifique VIDAL
 • Précieux dans le cadre de la FMC et de l’EPP, cet ouvrage s’adresse à tout professionnel de santé
- VIDAL Flash Cards
 • Une manière ludique de mettre à jour la connaissance sur les recommandations, basée sur les VIDAL Recos.
- Interactions médicamenteuses :
 • Ajout de monographies spécialités et DCI dans une ordonnance virtuelle
 • Analyse des interactions médicamenteuses de la prescription virtuelle par sévérité
- Effets indésirables classés par appareil et fréquence
- Modules d’équivalences internationales :
 • Recherche d’un médicament à partir du pays de provenance ou de destination
- Fil d’actualité VIDAL : actualité du médicament organisée par thématiques
- Reco du mois : une recommandation en accès libre
- Liste indicative des spécialités pharmaceutiques françaises contenant des produits dopants
- Lexique des maladies rares pour lesquelles il existe des médicaments spécifiques
- Reco Vaccinations, reprenant les recommandations officielles

Toutes les fonctionnalités sont gratuites. Les achats intégrés restent actifs pour le bon fonctionnement des versions précédentes.



*************************************


CONDITIONS D’USAGE & AUTHENTIFICATION
L’usage de VIDAL Mobile est destiné aux professionnels de santé habilités à prescrire ou à dispenser des médicaments ou à les utiliser dans l’exercice de leur art. Nous vous remercions de bien vouloir vous authentifier avant d’accéder à l’application.
L’utilisation de VIDAL Mobile ne dispense pas le professionnel de santé de vérifier les informations disponibles auprès des autorités ou de toutes autres sources officielles. VIDAL Mobile ne remplace pas la décision du prescripteur, seul juge des thérapeutiques à envisager.

Pour accéder à notre page POLITIQUE DE PROTECTION DES DONNÉES PERSONNELLES ET VIE PRIVÉE : https://www.vidal.fr/donnees-personnelles
Lien vers nos Conditions Générales d’Utilisation : https://www.vidal.fr/vidal-mobile-apple-store

Application de gestion de parcours de soin pour les médecins et les patients

- Médecins: 
1- Gestion des rendez-vous en ligne: recevez les demandes de RDV en ligne où que vous êtes sur l'applications dans la rubrique agenda, vous pouvez accepter, refuser ou re-planifier la demande.
2- Gestion sécurisée des questions médicales: Répondez depuis votre application aux questions médicales des patients, vous pourrez pouvez publier les questions pertinentes en préservant l'anonymat des utilisateurs.
3- Annuaire en ligne: Consultez l'annuaire med.tn sur l'application et bénéficiez des fonctionnalités avancées tel que la géolocalisation et la recherche par proximité.
4- Statistiques: Suivez les statistiques des visites de votre profils ainsi que plein d'autres chiffres clés directement dans la rubrique statistiques.
5- Gestion du profil: Modifiez et mettez à jour votre fiche professionnelle depuis l'application en toute sécurité.
6- Répondeurs SMS en ligne et gestion des appels manqués des patients (autorisation de lecture du journal requise): Ne ratez aucun appel patient, en acceptant cette fonctionnalité, vous pourrez configurer l'application de façon à ce qu'un SMS s'envoi automatiquement aux patients leurs invitant à prendre un Rendez-vous en ligne lorsque vous êtes injoignable.

- Patients: 
1- Annuaire médical complet: Consultez l'annuaire med.tn sur l'application et bénéficiez des fonctionnalités avancées tel que la géolocalisation et la recherche par proximité.
2- Gestion de profil: Modifiez et mettez à jour vos informations personnelles depuis l'application en toute sécurité.
3- Prise de rendez-vous en ligne: En quelques Click demandez un Rendez-vous avec le médecin de votre choix et recevez les notifications relatives au rendez-vous directement sur l'application.
4- Questions médicales: Doute, inquiétude ou besoin d'aide, posez votre question médicale en ligne en toute sécurité directement depuis l'application et recevez une notification instantanée pour chaque réponse. Des centaines de médecins sont prêts à vous répondre.

Les informations de cette base médicaments et pharmacies  sont issues de le Direction de la Pharmacie et du Médicament http://www.dpm.tn/ (DPM, 2021) et la pharmacie centrale de Tunisie http://www.phct.com.tn/ (PCT, 2021).

Pour la base de données médecins, les informations sont issues du Conseil National de l’Ordre des médecins (CNOM) http://www.ordre-medecins.org.tn/ (CNOM - Conseil National de l'Ordre des Médecins - Ordre des médecins, 2021).
 
Bien que Med.tn offre une assistance médicale, Il faut quand même consulter un médecin en cas d’urgence ou si vous envisagez de prendre tout autre médicament que ceux de votre prescription. 
 
Contactez nous sur: contact@med.tn

Full Code is an intuitive, mobile-first simulation designed by medical experts for individuals who want to become better medical professionals, including medical students, residents, physicians, nurses, NPs, PAs, EMTs, paramedics, and more.

The platform offers over 230+ realistic virtual cases and an engaging, game-like interface. You can choose from hundreds of possible actions as you diagnose and treat acutely sick patients in this open-ended medical simulation.

Daily, deliberate practice is the key to maintaining and improving your clinical skills. Download and play a free case today!

Interested in bringing Full Code to your organization or institution? Learn more at fullcodemedical.com!

Features:
• 230+ case library written and peer-reviewed by expert clinicians
• Over 30 diagnostic disciplines, including Emergency Medicine, OBGYN, and Pediatrics
• 25+ realistic avatars, including pediatric and adult patients
• *NEW* EMS cases and ambulance environment
• Detailed scoring and full case breakdowns - learn your strengths and weaknesses
• Patient AI enables practice with history taking
• Full Code Pro + CME provides 100+ hours of accredited CME
• Frequent new cases and regular updates

TRAIN ON YOUR TERMS
Full Code’s on-demand simulation training with realistic virtual patients allows you to practice complex cases and enhance your skills whenever you get a break, wherever you happen to be, on the devices you already own.

IMPROVE YOUR CONFIDENCE
Full Code's infinitely repeatable cases measure skills in both diagnosis and management, allowing you to learn from your mistakes in a risk-free environment. Build competence so you can face complex real-world cases with confidence.

PRACTICE MAKES THE PRACTITIONER
Frequent, deliberate practice is the key to clinical success and improving your clinical decision-making ability. Full Code can easily fit into any schedule—whether you're a med student or practicing clinician.

NEW CHALLENGES 
Every case presents a new challenge in Full Code: from routine diagnosis to rare diseases. You’re not just limited to the hospital, either—Full Code has expanded into pre-hospital and EMS content. Get out of the ED and into the ambulance for all new scenarios!

LEARN FROM TOP MEDICAL EXPERTS
Created by medical educators from some of the top hospitals in the U.S. and peer-reviewed by licensed medical professionals, our simulations are designed with industry-standard medical best practices, setting the bar high for medical students and professionals worldwide. 

EARN CME CREDIT
Complete your continuing medical education (CME) requirements with flexible and engaging simulation challenges accredited through the Accreditation Council for Continuing Medical Education (ACCME). With our PRO+CME subscription, you can earn up to 100 CME credits. Subscribe to Full Code Pro+CME to get started.

Medicament.ma est une base de données des médicaments commercialisés au Maroc.

L'objectif de ses initiateurs est de permettre aux internautes, et particulièrement les professionnels de santé, d'avoir des renseignements sur les spécialités pharmaceutiques commercialisées au Maroc.
 
On peut y effectuer des recherches par désignation commerciale, par substance active, par prix ou en scannant le code à barres figurant sur la plupart des médicaments commercialisés au Maroc.

On peut également effectuer une recherche des équivalents d'un médicament donné, fonction qui peut s’avérer utile pour trouver une alternative thérapeutique.

Développement: Ayoub Gdah (gdah.ayoub@gmail.com)

Explore human anatomy, physiology, and the life sciences in interactive 3D with Visible Body Suite! This subscription gives you access to our entire content library on your phone, tablet, and computer, combining the features of Physiology & Pathology, Muscles & Kinesiology, Visible Biology, Anatomy & Physiology, and Human Anatomy Atlas. Join the millions who’ve set aside the textbook, lab specimens, and plastic models and jump into an immersive 3D experience with Visible Body Suite!

Visible Body Suite includes:

Comprehensive 3D Models:
Complete and dissectible male and female gross anatomy, microanatomy, cross-sections, and pathology 3D models. Explore DNA, chromosomes, prokaryotic and eukaryotic cells, plant tissues, and fully dissectible vertebrate and invertebrate models (sea star, earthworm, frog, pig). Compare normal anatomy to common conditions like sprains, kidney stones, and endometriosis.

Interactive Learning & Simulations:
Walk through interactive lessons on physiological processes and pathologies. Visualize conduction in a dissectible, 3D beating heart while following along on an ECG for which you can set the heart rate. Manipulate dozens of muscle action animations to understand biomechanics. Interact with and study virtual simulations of photosynthesis, cellular respiration, mitosis, meiosis, and DNA coiling.

Extensive Information:
Access detailed information for thousands of anatomical structures, including definitions, pronunciations, and common diseases and conditions, as well as in-depth material about muscle attachments and innervation, and bony landmarks.

Engaging Visuals:
Dissect 3D anatomy models on screen or in augmented reality (AR). Watch 3D animations that explain gas exchange, pulmonary ventilation, fluid balance, peristalsis, muscle contractions, and more. View histology slides and diagnostic images.

Study & Assessment Tools:
Create and share 3D Flashcards. Label structures with tags, notes, and 3D drawings. Link sets of models in interactive 3D presentations to explain and review a topic. Take 3D dissection or multiple choice quizzes to test your knowledge and prepare for exams.

Key Body Systems Covered:
Cells and Tissues, Integumentary, Skeletal, Muscular, Nervous, Endocrine, Circulatory, Lymphatic, Respiratory, Digestive, Urinary, and Reproductive systems.

User-Friendly Features:
Simple controls, robust search engine, accessibility, adjustable settings, and multiple language options.

Perfect for medical practitioners, physical and occupational therapists, orthopedics, athletes, yogis, students, medical doctors, professors, and nurses, Visible Body Suite makes learning and teaching anatomy, physiology, and biology visual and engaging.

Subscriptions include multiple updates throughout the year at no additional cost!

developer: PERIOD TRACKER & PREGNANCY AND BABY CALENDAR LIMITED
description:
Pregnant? Get the free app for expectant parents to track how their baby is growing 

amma Pregnancy Calendar is an indispensable tool for expectant mothers! Get detailed information on the development of your baby at each week of pregnancy. Hundreds of thousands of women have already chosen to use this app, so join them, and us, on this incredible journey!

With amma Pregnancy Calendar you can easily:
- Get DAILY pregnancy info
- Track your pregnancy week-by-week over the 9 months 
- Get baby size information and development updates weekly
- Get information on changes in your body flow
- Manage weight and belly growth gain goals with clinical guidelines for your BMI
- Track contractions and send results to a medic with Contraction Timer
- Pregnancy+ Weight log
- Track baby kicks with Kick Counter
- Get more information about the weekly expectations of pregnancy 
- Share on Facebook, Email, Text & Twitter
- Personal Diary

and much more

Every woman who is expecting a child, is preparing herself for giving birth. Naturally, she will want to know how her baby is developing, what is happening to her body and what other changes are awaiting her until the birth. In this application, you will find a detailed weekly pregnancy calendar giving you ease of access to information about pregnancy and fetal development, changes in a pregnant woman's body, as well as tips on nutrition for pregnant women. For each week of pregnancy, there are four pieces of information: 
•	Baby development,
•	Mother’s body,
•	Mom’s meals,
•	Useful tips.
To use the pregnancy calendar, and count your due date, simply enter the date of your last period and you should see the information about your duration of gestation

This App is not intended for medical use, or to replace the advice of a trained medical doctor. If you have any concerns about your pregnancy, consult with your doctor or midwife.

MediHelp 2.0 – The Ultimate Medical Assistant for Healthcare Professionals

MediHelp is your clinical drug guide with dosing (adult/peds), drug–drug interactions, IV administration, pregnancy & lactation safety, and AI clinical help.

Built for pharmacists, physicians, nurses, and students — offline where it matters.

MediHelp 2.0 is the most powerful mobile companion for healthcare professionals — reimagined with a fresh design, AI-powered tools, and a wide range of clinical resources. Whether you're a pharmacist, physician, nurse, or medical student, MediHelp brings you trusted, evidence-based information and intelligent support at your fingertips.

MediHelp 2.0 brings you AI-powered clinical decision support

Access drug monographs, dosing calculators (adult/pediatric with renal/hepatic adjustments), IV administration guides, and pregnancy/breastfeeding safety at your fingertips

Quickly check for drug–drug interactions and get clinical counseling advice

Built by clinicians, evidence-based, for pharmacists, students, nurses, and physicians

Localized guides, dose calculators, interaction checker, clinical pharmacy support, med dosing assistant

Core Features of MediHelp 2.0:
Mechanism of Action (MOA): Clear, visual explanations of how medications work at molecular and physiological levels.

Smart Dosing Engine: Standard adult and pediatric dosing with automatic adjustments for renal/hepatic impairment, geriatric use, and special populations.

IV Administration Guidance: Step-by-step instructions for dilution, infusion rates, and Y-site compatibilities — critical for safe IV therapy.

Clinical Counseling Cards: Professionally written patient counseling tips for every medication — covering storage, food timing, missed dose, and more.

Black Box Warnings & Precautions: Instantly visible safety alerts based on FDA and global authorities.

Food & Drug Interactions: Specific recommendations for what to avoid and how food affects drug absorption and metabolism.

AI-Powered Clinical Support:
MediMate AI Chat: Your 24/7 medical assistant — ask any clinical question and get real-time, trustworthy responses from a medical-trained AI, backed by current guidelines.

Disease Treatment Protocols: First-line and second-line treatment recommendations tailored to specific conditions, with references.

Drug of Choice (DOC): The most updated suggestions for evidence-based pharmacotherapy across hundreds of conditions.

Interaction Checker: Easily screen for drug–drug interactions and avoid therapeutic failures or ADRs.

Pregnancy & Breastfeeding Safety: Understand what’s safe and what to avoid, based on global classifications (FDA, AU TGA).

Pharmacokinetics Hub: Access drug half-life, metabolism, excretion, bioavailability, and more.

Bonus Power Tools (20+ and growing):
Dose Calculator (by age or weight)

Compounding Formulas

Lab Interpretation Assistant

Supplements Companion

Antimicrobial Stewardship Toolkit

Counseling Pearls by Category

Case of the Day (with quizzes and tags)

Medical Quick References

Offline Support & Real-Time Cloud Sync

Customizable AI Reports & Translations

…and so much more — all inside a beautifully crafted, intuitive interface optimized for mobile use.

Trusted & Reliable
MediHelp uses information sourced from UpToDate, Lexicomp, Medscape, NIH, FDA, and global references to ensure everything is accurate, clinically relevant, and regularly updated.

Whether you're preparing for rounds, counseling a patient, managing a pharmacy, or studying for a board exam — MediHelp 2.0 is the essential smart assistant in your pocket.

Blood Pressure Health Tracking — YOUR PERSONAL BLOOD PRESSURE MONITORING ASSISTANT  

Managing hypertension starts with regular blood pressure monitoring. Blood Pressure Health Tracking simplifies logging, tracking, and analyzing your blood pressure, pulse, and weight. Take control of your health with this user-friendly and reliable tool.  

WHY REGULAR MONITORING MATTERS  
Hypertension is a leading cause of heart disease, strokes, and kidney issues. Often caused by excess weight, stress, or poor diet, it can go unnoticed until serious problems occur. By consistently tracking your blood pressure, you can identify changes early, reduce risks, and stay on top of your health.  

KEY FEATURES OF BLOOD PRESSURE HEALTH TRACKING  

BLOOD PRESSURE LOGGING  
Easily log your readings and monitor trends over time in an intuitive interface.  

WEIGHT MONITORING AND BMI CALCULATION  
Track your weight and calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) to address one of the key contributors to hypertension.  

PULSE MEASUREMENT  
Record your pulse alongside blood pressure readings for a complete overview of your cardiovascular health.  

SCAN YOUR BLOOD PRESSURE MONITOR  
Save time by scanning your blood pressure monitor screen. The app automatically records the results for you.  

MEASUREMENT HISTORY  
All your readings — blood pressure, weight, and pulse — are stored in one place. View changes by day, week, month, or year to analyze trends.  

GRAPHS AND TRENDS  
See clear, detailed graphs that help you visualize your progress, identify patterns, and make informed health decisions.  

APPLE HEALTH INTEGRATION  
Sync seamlessly with Apple Health to keep all your health data organized in one app.  

NUTRITIONAL TIPS AND HABITS  
Receive practical advice to improve your diet and lifestyle, such as reducing salt intake and eating heart-healthy foods to manage hypertension.  

PERSONALIZED REMINDERS  
Set reminders for blood pressure checks, weight tracking, and pulse measurements to ensure you stay consistent with your monitoring.  

WHO IS THIS APP FOR?  
Blood Pressure Health Tracking is designed for:  
- People managing hypertension who need regular monitoring.  
- Users looking to track weight, pulse, and cardiovascular health.  
- Anyone aiming to prevent heart-related issues and live a healthier, more active life.  

TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR HEALTH TODAY  
Blood Pressure Health Tracking helps you stay proactive about your health. Start monitoring your readings, analyze trends, and build habits that support a longer, healthier life.  

IMPORTANT  
This app is for informational purposes only and does not replace medical consultation. Always consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.
